This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were walking in the park when we noticed a few folks pointing up at the sky. Initially we thought they were observing some unique clouds, but we then saw what appeared to be a large black slow moving triangle in the sky. It was higher than the lowest level of clouds, but not extremely high, though it was difficult to place it without anything else to compare it to. It appeared to be changing shape as it moved across the sky, my husband suspected it was the light hitting it on different sides to the craft. I called my father-in-law at his house, he had access to a telescope. He later reported back to us that it was indeed changing shape. His initial sighting was of a stealth shape triangle, but moving backwards! As he watched it shifted into a rectangular box before floating into a cloud. I snapped a cellphone picture of it, unfortunately it isn't very informative...
